Reflections for mlr3

Source: R/mlr_reflections.R

Environment which stores various information for reflections.

mlr_reflections

Format

An object of class environment of length 12.

Examples

ls.str(mlr_reflections)
#> backend_formats :  chr [1:2] "data.table" "sparse"
#> default_mlr_control : List of 5
#>  $ store_model        : logi TRUE
#>  $ store_prediction   : logi TRUE
#>  $ encapsulate_train  : chr "none"
#>  $ encapsulate_predict: chr "none"
#>  $ log_threshold      : 'loglevel' int 400
#> experiment_slots : Classes ‘data.table’ and 'data.frame':	12 obs. of  4 variables:
#>  $ name  : chr  "task" "learner" "resampling" "iteration" ...
#>  $ type  : chr  "Task" "Learner" "Resampling" "integer" ...
#>  $ atomic: logi  FALSE FALSE FALSE TRUE FALSE TRUE ...
#>  $ state : Ord.factor w/ 5 levels "undefined"<"defined"<..: 2 2 3 3 3 3 4 4 4 5 ...
#> experiment_states :  chr [1:5] "undefined" "defined" "trained" "predicted" "scored"
#> learner_properties : List of 2
#>  $ classif: chr [1:6] "missings" "weights" "parallel" "twoclass" ...
#>  $ regr   : chr [1:4] "missings" "weights" "parallel" "importance"
#> log_classes :  chr [1:3] "output" "warning" "error"
#> predict_types : List of 2
#>  $ classif: chr [1:2] "response" "prob"
#>  $ regr   : chr [1:2] "response" "se"
#> task_col_roles : List of 2
#>  $ regr   : chr [1:5] "feature" "target" "order" "groups" ...
#>  $ classif: chr [1:5] "feature" "target" "order" "groups" ...
#> task_feature_types :  Named chr [1:6] "logical" "integer" "numeric" "character" "factor" ...
#> task_properties : List of 2
#>  $ classif: chr [1:3] "weights" "twoclass" "multiclass"
#>  $ regr   : chr "weights"
#> task_row_roles :  chr [1:2] "use" "validation"
#> task_types :  chr [1:2] "regr" "classif"
